entry.title: No watches or warnings in effect, St. Peters Bay

entry.title: Current Conditions: 5.4°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: St. Peters 10:00 AM AST Sunday 01 January 2023
Temperature: 5.4°C
Pressure / Tendency: 99.7 kPa falling
Humidity: 99 %
Dewpoint: 5.4°C
Wind: NE 13 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 1

entry.title: Sunday: Periods of rain. Temperature falling to plus 2 this afternoon.
entry.summary: Periods of rain. Fog patches dissipating early this afternoon. Amount 10 to 15 mm. Wind northeast 20 km/h becoming north 20 gusting to 40 early this afternoon. Temperature falling to plus 2 this afternoon. Forecast issued 11:00 AM AST Sunday 01 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 2. POP 30%
entry.summary: Periods of rain changing to snow this evening and ending after midnight then cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Rainfall amount 2 to 4 mm. Snowfall amount 2 cm. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 2. Wind chill minus 8 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM AST Sunday 01 January 2023

entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 2. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. Temperature steady near minus 2. Wind chill near minus 8. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM AST Sunday 01 January 2023
